featured.text: Her incredible story and superior swimming Brazilian government and later continued judo skills won her the opportunity to participate in the training at a youth facility.

However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.

definition.en_def: Relating to Brazil or its people.
definition.example: She loves Brazilian music and often dances to samba.
